title: [1.11.2-1.10.2][KAGIC]壮大自己的军队[授权搬运]
author: 莉莉霍瓦特
txt_content:
本帖最后由 没糖的葫芦 于 2018-8-3 16:47 编辑 
KAGIC-壮大你自己的军队
KAGIC增加了一些机器在你的minecraft世界中，让你可以在挖矿时收获自己的仆人和士兵。

作者那零零散散的更新日志：

v1.3.1 has been released, it fixes an extremely rare bug that occurs on Gem spawning.
v1.4.2 has been released, it fixes a bug caused when Rose Quartz is killed by lava or suffocation.
v1.5.2 has been released, it is essentially a rewrite of KAGIC. Make sure you back up your worlds before using this mod because it will delete anything added in previous versions.
v1.5.3 has been released, it fixes an issue with the update server crashing the game, and fixes a couple unexpected bugs.
If you have any ideas for the mod that wish to share, for example improvements, feedback, or requests, they would be greatly appreciated.
v1.6 has been released, this is a very major update, and I recommend everyone to update to it by clicking here.
Peridots now farm when equipped with a hoe.Fixed a crash caused when a Gem Seed hatches.Gems recognize their owners after the world reloads.Buffed Jaspers and Amethysts.


v1.6.1 has been released because I totally underestimated how long it would take to convert KAGIC to Minecraft 1.11.
Changed the current update notification system so you won't get notifications for a 1.11 update.
I will maintain the 1.10 version of KAGIC until next Christmas, after that it will no longer be updated.
v1.7.2 has been released, this fixes a bug in injectors, adds melon, pumpkin, and cactus soldiers that aide a Rose Quartz in its defense, and improves the Diamond's boss fights. The next bug fix update will look at a name tag issue and possible compatibility problems before Gem machines and Warp pads are worked on for the 1.8 update.
v1.7.3 has been released. It fixes the following bugs.
Fixed height adjustments in injectors.
Fixed Gems poofing (and often shattering) during the injection process.
KAGIC v1.7.9 has been released with the following fixes:Fixed Gems not creating their own exit holes.

提示：1.11通用1.11.2，汉化不好请见谅XD这已经是尽我所能了。授权：（已得到）
